name.description: Internal name of your host. Used for indicating the host of a model or for a connection.

endpoint.description: URL and base path for connections to the host.

host.description: Runtime provider of model. Can be dynamically deployed models on Hypermode or a project-defined host.

name.description: Internal name of your AI model. Used for indicating the model to use in an API call.

provider.description: Source location of model, such as 'hugging-face' or 'openai'.

sourceModel.description: Relative path of model within provider.

task.description: Training intent of model, such as 'classification' or 'embedding'.
